sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些前置词或短语均含"除……之外"之意。
means: besides ： 着重于指另外还有。
but ： 侧重指不包括在内。
except ： 侧重于排除在外，从整体里减去。可与but换用，但语气较强。
except for ： 多用于在说明基本情况或对主要部分加以肯定，还引出相反的原因或细节，从而部分地修正前面的主要意思，含惋惜意味。

sentence.Network_en: I think she has many good qualities besides being very beautiful.
sentence.Network_cn: 我觉得她不但长得非常漂亮，而且还有很多优秀品质。

sentence.Network_en: There was only one person besides Ford who knew Julia Jameson.
sentence.Network_cn: 除了福特以外，只有一个人认识朱莉娅·詹姆森。

sentence.Network_en: Besides diets, he devised punishing exercise routines.
sentence.Network_cn: 除了节制饮食，他还设计了魔鬼健身计划。

2013年英语四级词汇表(背诵)_百度文库 ... beside prep. 在…旁边 besides ad. 而且 bet vt.&vi.&n. 打赌.
出国旅游常用英语一览表_51766旅游网 ... May I have you name? 请问你贵姓？ Besides 另外，况且 Nice to see you 很高兴认识你。.

list.abs: Shine We Are_百度百科 ... 07. Searching for Truth( 寻找真实) 08. Beside you( 在你身边（beside you）) 09. Always( 离别情景).
... beat one's brains 竭尽全力了解 beside oneself 发狂，忘形 between two fires 左右为难.
S01_EP04_Lines-xlpang-ChinaUnix博客 ... ring it up: 算算看多少钱 beside oneself: 失常 stand guard: 站岗，放哨.
大学英语四级常用词组 ... back of 在...后面 beside point 离题的,不相干的 beyond question 毫无疑问.
关于家具的英语单词_百度知道 ... Bentwood furniture 曲木家具 Beside table 床头柜 Birch door 桦木门.

entry.def: Besides something or beside something means in addition to it.

example.ex: I think she has many good qualities besides being very beautiful...
example.tran: 我觉得她不但长得非常漂亮，而且还有很多优秀品质。

example.ex: There was only one person besides Ford who knew Julia Jameson.
example.tran: 除了福特以外，只有一个人认识朱莉娅·詹姆森。

entry.tran: 而且，再说（强调所补充的内容）
entry.def: Besides is used to emphasize an additional point that you are making, especially one that you consider to be important.

example.ex: The house was too expensive and too big. Besides, I'd grown fond of our little rented house.
example.tran: 这座房子太贵太大了。再说，我已经喜欢上我们租的小房子了。

sentences.sentence: "I don't want to go to a restaurant; besides, we can't afford it"
"she couldn't shelter behind him all the time and in any case he wasn't always with her"

auth_sentence.content: Besides the mention of the VLT and the link.
auth_sentence.res_content: Besides the mention of the VLT and the link.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Besides the mention of the VLT and the link.

auth_sentence.content: Besides, not making it isn't an option.
auth_sentence.res_content: Besides, not making it isn't an option.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Besides, not making it isn't an option.

auth_sentence.content: Besides, re-written in your words it proves nothing.
auth_sentence.res_content: Besides, re-written in your words it proves nothing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Besides, re-written in your words it proves nothing.

Sentence.sentence: People were tired of using the iPad textbook besides using it for reading," says Kalpit Shah, who will be going into his second year at Irvine's medical program this fall.

In recent years, a growing body of research has shown that our appetite and food intake are influenced by a large number of factors besides our biological need for energy, including our eating environment and our perception of the food in front of us.
Tamlyn says that besides importing ingredients from Britain once a week, his restaurant also buys vegetables from the local markets.
Besides the sharp increase in oil prices, OPEC's 1973 oil embargo caused panic in the West.
Besides these symptoms of altitude sickness, others such as headache and fatigue may also occur.

sentences.en: I don't want to go;  besides, I'm too tired.
sentences.cn: 我不想去, 再说我也太累了。

sentences.en: He had other people to take care of besides me.
sentences.cn: 除了我以外, 他还需要照料其他人。

jushi.english: This is my best suit; I have two other besides.
jushi.chinese: 这是我最好的一套衣服,我另外还有两套衣服。

jushi.english: I don't want to go; besides,I'm too tired.
jushi.chinese: 我不想去,再说我也太累了。

jushi.english: Besides, I want you to promise me one thing.
jushi.chinese: 此外，我要你答应我一件事。
